name: WP Easy Sharer
author: Mehmet Akyol

sections.description: Description: WP Easy Sharer is a wordpress plugin that adds social media links to at the end of each post and page without having to deal with any code and editing your theme files.
sections.installation:
1. Extract wp-easy-sharer.zip folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Then you are done.
sections.faq:
*What does this plugin do?
It directly adds facebook, twitter, digg, delicious, reddit
and stumbleupon sharing buttons to at the end of each post and page.

short_description: WP Easy Sharer is a wordpress plugin that adds social media links to at the end of each post and page without having to deal with any code at all.
description: Description: WP Easy Sharer is a wordpress plugin that adds social media links to at the end of each post and page without having to deal with any code and editing your theme files.
